value_claims.claim_title: AI-powered recommendations increase average order value
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses collaborative filtering and machine learning for smart recommendations based on browsing patterns and similar customer purchases, resulting in increased engagement and average order value.
value_claims.source_quote: ASOS uses collaborative filtering and machine learning for smart recommendations, to suggest products based on browsing patterns and what similar customers buy together, increasing engagement and average order value.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly states that ML-based recommendations directly increase AOV through personalized product suggestions

value_claims.claim_title: Fit Assistant reduces size-related returns and increases conversions
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS Fit Assistant uses ML to analyze past purchases, returns, and customer measurements to provide accurate size recommendations, reducing returns and improving customer satisfaction.
value_claims.source_quote: The ASOS Fit Assistant tool uses machine learning to analyze past purchases, returns, and customer measurements to provide accurate size recommendations, reducing returns and improving customer satisfaction.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: ML algorithms directly analyze customer data to provide size recommendations that reduce returns

value_claims.claim_title: Azure OpenAI-powered AI Stylist enhances product discovery
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS AI Stylist uses Azure OpenAI conversational tools to help customers discover products through interactive chat, understanding style preferences and shopping occasions for personalized suggestions.
value_claims.source_quote: AI Stylist uses Azure OpenAI-powered conversational tools that help customers discover products through interactive chat, understanding their style preferences and shopping occasions for personalized suggestions.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Azure OpenAI directly powers the conversational interface that provides personalized style recommendations

value_claims.claim_title: AI-powered supply chain traceability supports sustainability goals
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS partnership with TrusTrace provides AI-powered supply chain mapping and traceability, supporting sustainability goals and risk management with target to map 100% of products to raw materials by 2030.
value_claims.source_quote: ASOS AI personalization strategy enhances supply chain transparency with its partnership with TrusTrace that provides AI-powered supply chain mapping and traceability, supporting sustainability goals and risk management with a target to map 100% of products to raw materials by 2030.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI platform directly collects and validates supply chain data for traceability and risk management

value_claims.claim_title: Profile Builder personalizes experiences across customer touchpoints
value_claims.claim_description: Profile Builder learns preferences from 36 sample products to personalize experiences across email, recommendations, and website features throughout the shopping journey.
value_claims.source_quote: The Profile Builder feature learns preferences from 36 sample products to personalize experiences across email, recommendations, and website features throughout the shopping journey.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI/ML system directly analyzes customer preferences to personalize multiple touchpoints

value_claims.claim_title: Backend AI tools increase operational efficiency
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses Microsoft Copilot, Power Automate, and GitHub to streamline internal processes, automate tasks, and enable rapid prototyping of new customer experiences.
value_claims.source_quote: ASOS increases operational efficiency with backend AI tools including Microsoft Copilot, Power Automate, and GitHub streamline internal processes, automate tasks, and enable rapid prototyping of new customer experiences.
value_claims.quote_location: Key Ways ASOS Leverages AI section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI tools directly automate internal processes and enable faster development cycles

value_claims.claim_title: Profits tripled during AI adoption period
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS experienced significant profit increase from end of 2020 to start of 2021, with profits tripling during the period of AI and AR technology integration.
value_claims.source_quote: The retailers commitment to innovation and embracing new technologies has paid off, as the company experienced a significant increase in profits from the end of 2020 to the start of 2021. Their profits tripled during this period.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Profit increase occurred during AI adoption period but multiple factors likely contributed beyond AI alone

value_claims.claim_title: Virtual photoshoots enable continuous product releases
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses virtual photoshoots with digital replicas of clothing mapped onto real models, developed with Zeekit, allowing continued weekly product releases with realistic garment images.
value_claims.source_quote: One innovative approach they adopted was the use of virtual photoshoots, where six real-life models had digital replicas of the brand's clothing mapped onto their bodies. This allowed ASOS to continue providing new product releases each week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AR/AI technology directly enables virtual photoshoots that maintain product release velocity

value_claims.claim_title: AI shopping support accelerates purchase completion
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS AI systems help shoppers complete purchases 47% faster through enhanced personalization and interaction analysis across the shopping journey.
value_claims.source_quote: A study shows that shoppers complete purchases 47% faster with AI support. ASOS enhances shopping speed with AI.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI systems directly analyze interactions and personalize experiences to accelerate purchase decisions

value_claims.claim_title: Style Match visual search enables instant product discovery
value_claims.claim_description: ASOS Style Match uses AI to analyze uploaded images for color, pattern, and clothing type to recommend similar products instantly, enabling customers to recreate desired looks.
value_claims.source_quote: The ASOS Style Match is a visual search tool that allows users to find products on the ASOS app by simply uploading a picture or taking a photo. The AI technology analyzes the image's color, pattern, and type of clothing to recommend similar products instantly.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI technology directly analyzes images and provides product recommendations based on visual features

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS operates in online fashion retail sector
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS is a leading online fashion retailer serving young shoppers globally
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS is one of the most popular brands for young shoppers, especially in the UK. The brand has a global presence and caters to customers across the globe.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS operates at global scale with hundreds of countries
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS serves customers in hundreds of countries and works with thousands of products
context_claims.source_quote: Catering to customers in hundreds of countries, and working with thousands and lakhs of products, the fashion brand has adopted various strategies to meet the growing customer needs.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS aims to enhance customer experience and increase conversions
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS implements AI to enhance customer experience, increase conversions, and improve customer satisfaction
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS implements artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), predictive analytics, and automation, among other AI-based capabilities to enhance customer experience, increase conversions, and customer satisfaction.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS targets 100% supply chain mapping by 2030
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS has set a sustainability goal to map 100% of its own products' supply chains to raw material level by 2030
context_claims.source_quote: With this tool, ASOS aims to have 100% of its own products' supply chains mapped to raw material level by 2030.

context_claims.claim_title: Profit increase occurred from end of 2020 to start of 2021
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS experienced significant profit growth during the period from late 2020 to early 2021
context_claims.source_quote: The company experienced a significant increase in profits from the end of 2020 to the start of 2021. Their profits tripled during this period.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS partners with Microsoft for AI tools
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses Microsoft technologies including Azure OpenAI, Copilot for Microsoft 365, and Power Automate
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS uses Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and GitHub for code. The brand uses Power Automate for process automation, and Teams Premium for automated meeting summaries.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS partners with TrusTrace for supply chain traceability
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS partnered with TrusTrace to implement AI-based supply chain traceability and transparency
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS partnered with TrusTrace to implement AI-based supply chain traceability. The tool provides real-time visibility into its supply chain.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS partners with Zeekit for virtual photoshoot technology
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS collaborated with Israeli AR and AI company Zeekit to develop virtual photoshoot capabilities
context_claims.source_quote: This cutting-edge technology was developed in collaboration with Israeli AR and AI company Zeekit, and it allowed ASOS to continue providing new product releases each week.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS applies AI to marketing and customer engagement
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses AI for personalized recommendations, email marketing, and customer interaction across touchpoints
context_claims.source_quote: The tool then uses these insights to personalize customer experiences via recommendations, email marketing, promotional messages, etc.
context_claims.apqc_name: Market and Sell Products and Services

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS applies AI to supply chain management
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses AI for supply chain mapping, traceability, risk management, and compliance
context_claims.source_quote: The AI platform collects and validates supply chain data, streamlines risks, manages regulatory compliance, footprint calculations, etc.

context_claims.claim_title: ASOS applies AI to product development and merchandising
context_claims.claim_description: ASOS uses AI for product recommendations, sizing, visual search, and style matching
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS implements machine learning to identify products that can be recommended to customers, based on customers' browsing patterns.
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and Manage Products and Services

context_claims.claim_description: ASOS offers clothes, accessories, and footwear from multiple brands under one roof
context_claims.source_quote: ASOS AI systems work with thousands of products as the brand offers clothes, accessories, and footwear from multiple brands under one roof.
